mapper.insert: insert into user (nid, username, phoneNumber, password, name, emailAddress, role, status) values (#{nid}, #{username}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{name}, #{emailAddress}, #{role}, #{status})
mapper.update: update user set nid = #{nid}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, role = #{role}, emailAddress = #{emailAddress} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select password from user where nid = #{nid}
